titleStmt.title: A funeral sermon Opening the nature and grounds of assurance, occasioned by the death of Mr. Philip King, Minister. Who departed this life, November, 8th. 1699. By Jonathan Owen.
titleStmt.author: Owen, Jonathan.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Crowns in Cheapside near Mercers-Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Edinburgh University Library.
